dolphinsofthedeep.title: Dolphins of the Deep
dolphinsofthedeep.description: Befriend and ride a variety of dolphin species in Minecraft, gaining gifts to level up! Fundraising for WDC.
dolphinsofthedeep.body:
Minecraft: Java Edition 1.19 / Minecraft Forge 1.19 - 41.1.0 / Fabric Loader 0.14.6 / Fabric API 0.57.0+1.19

Features

  • Meet 3 naturally-spawning species of dolphin: Common Dolphin, Bottlenose & Pink River Dolphin
  • Befriend dolphins by giving them fish, and then ride them with a saddle, crafting and equipping armour.
  • Receive gifts and a custom material, delphinium, to give you a marine theme!

Fundraising

If you enjoy this free mod, please show your support by giving a voluntary donation to the Whale and Dolphin Conservation charity on this JustGiving page:

justgiving.com/dolphinsofthedeep

  • The effects of accidental capture in nets have already taken their toll on New Zealand's Endangered Hector's and Critically Endangered Maui's Dolphins, and this trend will spread if we don't act soon.
  • Over 1,500 whales and similar numbers of dolphins are victims of purposeful hunting.
  • Over 3,600 whales and dolphins are still held in captivity.

Through raising awareness, taking political action and providing alternatives, WDC aims to take action to prevent all these factors putting cetaceans in danger. To learn more about the actions WDC is taking, please see their website.

Credits

Thank you to MG, AG and CG for helping with playtesting, graphics, and ideas!

Download the mod

youareacat.title: You Are A Cat! Game
youareacat.description: In this videogame, you are a cat exploring a world of pixels!
youareacat.body:
Play the free game below!

You can play in singleplayer or multiplayer and discover new biomes! How far can you explore?

(I began creating this when I was relatively new to programming and JS canvas, so some of my techniques are extremely inefficient.)

turingtape.title: TuringTape
turingtape.body:
This project is a tribute to the computer scientist Alan Turing, and is a simulation of a machine in one of his thought experiments. When you are writing the algorithm, hover over a field to see what it is.

The Code and The Project

Open project in a new tab
